amendment.description: To limit essential air service to locations that are 100 or more miles away from the nearest medium or large hub airport.

vote.text: Amendment SA 80 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 80 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 23.
Amendment SA 80 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S826, S828) To limit essential air service to locations that are 100 or more miles away from the nearest medium or large hub airport.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 80 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 80 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 23.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 80 proposed by Senator Coburn.
